developer: Ministry of Health - infrmation System Department
description:
(App Work Inside Kuwait only)
Kuwait Ministry Of Health official app, providing e-health services for citizens and residents on the online portal.

Sick Leaves online:
· Patients can view and download their Sick Leaves issued within the past year.
· Doctors in the public sector can issue and approve the Sick Leaves.
· QR code on the document can be scanned to verify its authenticity.

Medical Reports:
· Patients can view the status of the Medical Report, pay the fees and view the report.
· Doctors can create, review and approve Medical Reports.
· QR code on the document can be scanned to verify its authenticity.

More E-Services:
· Search for nearby hospitals and clinics.
· Clinical appointments at Primary Care dental clinics and referral appointments for specialized clinics such as Diabetes, Maternity as well as Hospitals. 
· Appointments for the Public Health Departments such as Food handler Examinations, Premarital Screening and Expatriate Health Management. 
· Appointments for the Treatment Abroad Department. 
· Online Health Insurance registration for residents. 

We will continue introducing more e-services for Clinical, Hospital and Administrative Management.

The FreeStyle LibreLink app is approved for use with FreeStyle Libre and FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensors. You can check your glucose by scanning your sensor with your phone. Now FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensor users can get automatic glucose readings in the FreeStyle LibreLink app, updated every minute, and also receive alarms when your glucose is low or high. [1][2]

You can use the FreeStyle LibreLink app to:

* View your current glucose reading, trend arrow and glucose history
* Receive low or high glucose alarms with FreeStyle Libre 2 system sensors [2]
* Add notes to track your food, insulin use and exercise
* See reports, such as Time in Range and Daily Patterns
* Share your data with your doctor and family, with your permission [3]

SMARTPHONE COMPATIBILITY
Compatibility may vary between phones and operating systems. Learn more about compatible phones at http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

USING YOUR APP AND READER WITH THE SAME SENSOR
Alarms can only be issued on your FreeStyle Libre 2 reader or your phone (not both). To receive alarms on your phone, you must start the sensor with the app. To receive alarms on your FreeStyle Libre 2 reader, you must start the sensor with your reader. Once the sensor has been started with the reader, you can also scan that sensor with your phone.

Remember that the app and reader do not share data with each other. For complete information on a device, scan your sensor every eight hours with that device; otherwise, your reports will not include all your data. You can upload and view data from all of your devices on LibreView.com.

APP INFORMATION
FreeStyle LibreLink is intended for measuring glucose levels in people with diabetes when used with a sensor. For more information on how to use FreeStyle LibreLink, refer to the User’s Manual, which can be accessed through the app. If you require a printed User’s Manual, contact Abbott Diabetes Care Customer Support.

Consult a healthcare professional to confirm if this product is right for you or if you have questions about how to use this product to make treatment decisions.

Learn more at http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

[1] If you are using the FreeStyle LibreLink app, you must also have access to a blood glucose monitoring system, as the app does not provide one.  

[2] Alarms that you receive do not include your glucose reading, so you must scan your sensor to check your glucose.

[3] Use of FreeStyle LibreLink and LibreLinkUp requires registration with LibreView.

The sensor housing, FreeStyle, Libre, and related brand marks are marks of Abbott. Other trademarks are the property of their respective owners.

For additional legal notices and terms of use, go to http://FreeStyleLibre.com.

========

To resolve any technical or Customer Service issues that you are having with a FreeStyle Libre product, please contact FreeStyle Libre Customer Service directly.

User-friendly, secure, and adaptable, it allows patients to manage appointments and interact with healthcare providers. Major Features
 
Scheduling & Agenda
With Sapphire Care, the patient can access all listed healthcare providers, check availability of the desired specialty and/or physician and immediately book and manage appointments online.
 
Smart Communications

صيدلية رويال هي أسهل طريقة لاكتشاف وتسوق منتجات الصحة والجمال واللياقة البدنية.
يمكنك شراء الأدوية عبر الإنترنت وتسليمها على عتبة بابك في معظم مدن الكويت . 
لدينا صيادلة مدربون على أعلي مستوى ومستعدون لصرف الأدوية بسرعة وكفاءة وفقا لحاجتك والإجابة على أي استفسارات لديكم متعلقة بالصحة. 
لدينا شبكة من أكثر من 60 صيدلية موزعة في المناطق السكنية الرئيسية في الكويت وتخدم أكثر من مليون عميل سنويا.

أهم المميزات:
نفذ طلب الدواء الخاص بك عبر الإنترنت: يمكنك استخدام تطبيق صيدبية رويال لطلب الأدوية عبر الإنترنت والحصول على تسليم سريع للغاية. كما يمكنك الحصول على خصومات وعروض إضافية على كل عملية شراء.
الحصول على مشورة طبية من الصيادلة : يمكن للصيادلة المؤهلين تأهيلا عاليا إرشادك والإجابة على جميع الاستفسارات المتعلقة بالصحة. معلومات عامة واستشارات حول مواضيع الصحة العامة و / أو التفاعلات بين الأدوية  و ذلك على الموقع وخط المساعدة المركزية.
تسليم عتبة الباب: ليس فقط للأدوية التي تصرف دون وصفة طبية، يمكنك أيضا شراء الأدوية الموصوفة بمجرد تسجيل الدخول وتحميل الوصفة على موقعنا على الانترنت.

شراء منتجات اللياقة البدنية: نحن نقدم مجموعة واسعة من المكملات الغذائية ومكملات اللياقة البدنية 
مستحضرات التجميل: نحن ملتزمون تماما بتوفير القسم الأكثر شمولا من منتجات العناية بالبشرة والجمال والعناية الشخصية المصممة لتلبية احتياجات العملاء المختلفة.
التسليم فائق السرعة: في نفس اليوم أو التسليم في اليوم التالي.
لدينا مجموعة واسعة من المنتجات تشمل على سبيل المثال لا الحصر:
- الأدوية الطبية الصيدلانية.
- الأدوية غير الموصوفة طبيا (OTC)
- منتجات العناية بالصحة العامة 
- منتجات العناية بالبشرة والجمال والعناية الشخصية
- العدسات، نظارات القراءة، ركن البصريات
- المعدات الطبية 
- مستلزمات الرعاية الطبية المنزلية
- حلول التنقل (العكازات، والمشاة، والكراسي المتحركة)

In 1963, Dar Al Shifa Hospital (DASH) was established as the first private hospital in the State of Kuwait. Originally, it was a maternity hospital located in Sharq, Kuwait city. Since that time, the hospital became a leading health care organization in the region.

In 1992, DASH went through a notable expansion under the ownership of Mr. Ali Jeraq who had a visionary goal to make healthcare services accessible to every individual in the community. As a result, DASH developed into a fully-fledged general hospital that included a wide scope of services.

Over the last few years, DASH has proved itself as a trustworthy organization in which patient/family-centered care is provided through a competent and diverse team of health care professionals utilizing the latest technology and applying evidence-based practices. Another significant achievement of DASH is attaining recognized international accreditation and awards from Accreditation Canada and American College of Radiology.

Today, DASH is continuously growing and evolving as a distinguished health care organization with a focus on providing comprehensive and specialized services to meet the needs of the community. DASH dedication towards development and growth is reflected in the ongoing expansion which will make it the largest private hospital in Kuwait.

في عام 1963، تم تأسيس مستشفى دار الشفاء كأول مستشفى خاص في دولة الكويت. وقد كان بالأساس مستشفى متخصص للنساء والولادة يقع في منطقة شرق، بمدينة الكويت. ومنذ ذلك الوقت، أصبح المستشفى مؤسسة رعاية صحية رائدة في المنطقة.

في عام 1992، مر مستشفى دار الشفاء بمرحلة توسعات تحت إشراف المالك السيد/ علي جراق والذي كان يمتلك رؤية وهدفاً في تمكين كل فرد في المجتمع من الحصول على خدمات الرعاية الصحية. ونتيجة لذلك، حقق مستشفى دار الشفاء تطوراً كبيراً وأصبح مستشفى عام متكامل يتضمن مجموعة واسعه من الخدمات.

وعلى مدى السنوات الأخيرة، برهن مستشفى دار الشفاء عن أصالته وأنه مؤسسة موثوقة حيث يكون المريض وعائلته هم مركز الإهتمام والرعاية، ويتم تقديم الخدمات من قبل فريق متنوع ومختص من مقدمي الرعاية الصحية بإستخدام أحدث التقنيات وتطبيق الممارسات الصحية الموصى بها عالمياً. ومن الإنجازات الهامة والبارزة التي حققها المستشفى أيضاً حصوله على شهادات اعتماد عالمية معتمدة من مجلس اعتماد الجودة الكندي والكلية الأمريكية للأشعة.

واليوم، يعتبر مستشفى دار الشفاء مؤسسة بارزة ومستمرة التطور في مجال الرعاية الصحية والتي تُركز على تقديم الخدمات المتخصصة والشاملة لمواكبة احتياجات المجتمع. إن تكريس مستشفى دار الشفاء لجهوده نحو النمو والتطور ينعكس من خلال التوسع المستمر والذي يجعل منه أكبر المستشفيات الخاصة في دولة الكويت.

Discover one of the top pregnancy tracker apps designed specifically for women and expecting parents. This application will keep you calm throughout your pregnancy, providing daily insights into your baby's development and your own health. It will let you know what’s happening with you and your unborn baby—week after week—and offer guidance on how to handle new situations. New, helpful articles are posted every day to support your pregnancy journey!




Keep track of your weight, blood pressure, tummy growth, baby's first movements, and contractions with our advanced tracking tools. Save all your important data in a single, easy-to-share report for your doctor, ensuring your pregnancy progress is well-documented.


May your pregnancy be pleasant and wonderful! Our app provides the tools and resources expecting parents need to feel confident and prepared.



The Most Interesting Features of the App:
- Convenient Calendar: Schedule tests and doctor visits effortlessly.  

- Pregnancy Diary: Use this tracker to log your weight, tummy size, blood pressure, mood, and sexual activity daily. Never miss appointments or key tests.  

- Weekly Baby Development Updates: Find out when your baby becomes the size of a grapefruit, grows eyelashes, or when you can discover their gender. Get nutritional and lifestyle advice tailored for women and their babies.  

- Daily Articles: Access a wealth of resources and tools with professional advice to help women navigate emotions, relationships, and health during pregnancy.  

- Doctor Report: Compile all your tracking data into a comprehensive report, available as a PDF or on your phone, to share with your doctor.  

- Checklists and To-Do Lists: Stay organized with trimester-specific checklists and to-do lists—perfect for expecting parents.  

- Smart Gestational Age Calculator: Trusted by top medical professionals, this tool calculates fetal and obstetric terms with pinpoint accuracy.  

- Kegel Exercises: Prepare for childbirth with guided exercises, an essential tool for women’s health during pregnancy.  

- Contraction Counter: This intelligent tracker distinguishes real contractions from practice ones, ensuring you and your baby are ready for delivery.  

- Health App Synchronization: Securely save your pregnancy tracking data with seamless integration.

Lin X is an application available on your phone used to receive and display the glucose concentration value and remind when the blood glucose value exceeds the upper or lower limit of the preset blood glucose value. It also has system Settings and other functions to help users analyze and evaluate the glucose reading of the continuous glucose monitoring system and form a report. 

Measuremenrs displayed on LinX cannot be used for the diagnosis and screening of diabetes. If users need help, please advise with professions for further medical assistance.


Note: 
The compatible medical hardware is available in the following countries/regions: Indonesia.

VOKA Anatomy Pro is a unique complete catalog of medically accurate 3D models of biodigital human anatomy and pathologies, including rare diseases and classic anatomed studies of the digestive system.


This mobile atlas is designed to be always at hand for junior medical students, lecturers, doctors, and medical organizations: to view the models on the required scale, from any angle, both inside and out. It provides additional clarity to pathology understanding and learning, made it much easier various disease.


Our focus is to provide really true-to-life three-dimensional visual of human body, physiology systems, muscular, pathologies and including detailed models of muscles and skeletal. Each and every 3D anatomy model is developed in close cooperation with top-notch medical professionals of research centers, basic on actual DICOM data from CT/MRI, thought out to the very smallest detail, and verified by the medical advisory board, ensuring accuracy in radiology.


All 3D models are labeled, dissected, and segmented to facilitate configuration meeting any visualization needs. For instance, you can hide the outer membrane, which opens up the maximum field of view of the pathology and facilitates understanding its anatomy. In addition to all possible types of pathologies, each c. ategory of the catalog includes reference anatomy 3D models of healthy organs, head, skeleton structures, bones & muscle.


VOKA Anatomy Pro is empowered guide with an AR mode that lets you overlay virtual 3D models on the real world and learn human anato my and pathologies in augmented reality. Enjoy a truly immersive lite experience while me morizing complex anatomy parts!


In the app, you will also find medical articles with terminology that describe the types and subtypes of pathologies from an anatomical point of image, clinical presentation, and treatment methods  including those related to spasticity. Use them to prepare for yoga, classes or refresh your knowledge, flashcards and teach materials in your personal pocket for share with mates.


VOKA Anatomy Pro:


- full-scale immersion in the 3D e-anatomy and pathologies


- the highest level of medical precision


- astonishingly lifelike 3D graphics


- a lightweight app with full functionality since 2017


The app is recommended for:


- medical students including beginners to make it easy to visualize human anatomy and pass exams


- lecturers for lectures and practical classes in online and offline modes


- medical specialists to provide patients with a better understanding of their health conditions


The latest release includes total over 700 pathology and anatomy 3D models:


- Anatomyka

- Congenital heart defects

- Gynecology

- Otorhinolaryngology

- Dentistry

- Acquired heart diseases 

- Respiratory system diseases

- Obstetrics

- CNS and PNS disorders

- Eye disorders

- Vascular diseases

- Liver diseases

- new categories in regular app updates


Features and terms:


1. Zooming in/out to examine each anatomical detail inside and outside 3D model

2. 360° rotation to view 3D models from any angle on your iphone

3. Isolating and hiding anatomical structures to focus on the essentials

4. Reading text information visible on the model system

5. The opportunity to study the names of anatomical structures and their nesting

6. Daily saving the necessary materials to personal collections for quick access

7. Sharing links for useful pathology models and articles with fellows iii

8. Fast speed and convenient search through all the materials like using a medical dictionary

9. AR mode to display 4d+ pathologies in a real-world environment, e .g. on a mannequin


Available in 3 languages:


- English

- German

- Russian


Download VOKA Anatomy Pro for FREE and get all pathology 3D models on your mobile phone. Always with you, to use it anywhere and anytime you like!

Join the #1 Pregnancy & Baby Tracker App that’s Trusted by Millions for Week-by-Week Guidance and Baby Tracking Tools.

What to Expect is the world’s best-known baby development and growth tracker app chosen by more than 15 million parents. We’re the parenting, infant and family planning brand, offering you a free all-in-one pregnancy and baby tracker app with thousands of medically accurate articles, daily pregnancy updates, expert baby growth tracking, and personalized parenting tips to help you nurture a healthy pregnancy, a thriving baby, and confident parenting.

Find guides for every step of your growing family’s journey—from starting a family and recognizing early signs of pregnancy to navigating motherhood, newborn care, and the baby and toddler years. Find support and connection with moms, parents, and parents-to-be throughout your pregnancy journey.

During Pregnancy

* Due Date Calculator that determines your due date based on last period, IVF transfer, conception, and ultrasound, while sharing fun facts about your baby
* Week-by-week pregnancy tracker with info about baby development, symptoms and family preparation tips
* Themed baby size comparisons, visual countdown and 3D videos showing baby development in utero week by week of pregnancy
* Helpful daily tips designed to support you at every stage
* Keep track of your bump, symptoms, pregnancy weight, kick counts, birth plan and memories with our My Journal tool
* Expert-reviewed articles on signs of labor, pregnancy symptoms, baby and mom’s health and helpful tips
* Registry Builder to help you with your baby list and registry
* Detailed pregnancy and baby product reviews and expert buying guides
* Expecting Twins? Learn about different types of twins and possible fetal positions
* Use the contractions counter to track the frequency and duration of contractions

After Baby’s Arrival

* Baby Tracker that lets you time and track baby’s feedings, log pump sessions, diaper changes, tummy time, and more
* Month-by-month and milestone tracker for each step of your baby’s life, from the newborn to the toddler stage
* Daily tips tailored  to your baby’s age, stage, your postpartum recovery, and your parenting journey
* Record your postpartum symptoms and medications 
* Informative videos and articles about sleep schedules, feeding tips, milestones, and baby’s growth and week-by-week development
* Medically reviewed articles and info about baby’s health, doctor’s appointments and vaccines
* Join community groups meet people with due dates in the same month, newborn care, mom’s health conditions, parenting styles and more

Family Planning

* Ovulation Calculator that pinpoints your most fertile days based on last period and cycle
* Due Date Calculator that helps you figure out baby’s potential due date when you’re trying to conceive (TTC)
* Ovulation tracker and early pregnancy signs, plus keep a journal of your feelings when you’re trying to get pregnant
* Expert advice and articles to help you understand your cycle, signs of ovulation and pregnancy, fertility issues, adoption and surrogacy, and more
* Community groups devoted to preparing for pregnancy and fertility treatments

About Us 

All content on the What to Expect app is accurate, up-to-date, and reviewed by medical experts, including the What to Expect Medical Review Board. It aligns with current health guidelines and Heidi Murkoff’s trusted books 

Medical information comes from expert sources like ACOG, AAP, CDC, and peer-reviewed journals to ensure reliability and credibility.

For more about What to Expect's medical review and editorial policy, visit: https://www.whattoexpect.com/medical-review/

LibreLinkUp allows you to monitor and support people who are using a FreeStyle Libre sensor and compatible FreeStyle Libre app. You can link up by asking them to invite you in their app. 

Whether you’re a family member, friend or co-worker, the LibreLinkUp app helps you monitor and support people in your life so they can better manage their diabetes. You can use the LibreLinkUp app to view their glucose with a quick glance of your phone if they’re using a FreeStyle Libre sensor and app. 

Innovations include:

GLUCOSE HISTORY AND INSIGHTS: Touch the glucose graph to see recent history, or review a logbook of glucose scans [2] and alarms [3, 4] – so you can better understand glucose patterns 
GLUCOSE ALARMS: Receive alerts when glucose is high or low, so you can help them take action [3, 4]
SENSOR ALERTS Get notified when a new sensor is started, and when a sensor and app lose connectivity [3, 4]
DARK MODE: View glucose data in lower-light conditions, whether it’s in a cinema or the middle of the night 



In order to protect your privacy and personal information, this app store should not be used as your first point of contact to resolve technical or customer services issues. Instead, please visit us at www.librelinkup.com/support to view support information, and select ‘Contact Support’ to directly submit your comment to our support team if you are unable to find an answer to your concern.


[1] Both your LibreLinkUp app and the Freestyle Libre user’s app must be connected to the Internet in order share glucose information.
[2] Requires use of FreeStyle Libre sensors
[3] Requires use of FreeStyle Libre 2 or FreeStyle Libre 3 sensors.
[4] Certain features or capabilities may not be available in all countries.

Huckleberry is your all-in-one parenting partner, proudly trusted by 5+ million families worldwide. 

From baby tracker to personalized guidance, our award-winning app helps you navigate sleep, feeding, milestones, and everything in between. Backed by a team of pediatric experts and powered by smart tools, Huckleberry supports each family’s unique journey. We turn restless nights into restful routines, making more space for everyday magic.

TRUSTED SLEEP GUIDANCE & TRACKING

Your baby's sleep and daily rhythms are unique. Our comprehensive baby tracker helps you understand their natural patterns while providing expert sleep guidance every step of the way. From breastfeeding to nappies, our newborn tracker gives you peace of mind in those early days and beyond.

SWEETSPOT®: YOUR SLEEP TIMING COMPANION

A most-loved feature that predicts your baby's ideal nap times with remarkable accuracy. No more guessing about sleep windows or watching for tired cues—SweetSpot® learns your child's unique rhythms to suggest optimal sleep times. Available with Plus and Premium memberships.

BERRY: 24/7 PARENTING GUIDANCE 

Instant parenting backup that adapts to what you need, when you need it. Using expert-vetted and AI-powered guidance, Berry can work through the messiness of parenting with you. You can solve challenges, get reassurance, and easily track multiple things at once—all in one AI chat. No matter the moment or mood, you always have backup.

FREE APP FEATURES

• Simple, one-touch baby tracker for sleep, nappy changes, feedings, pumping, growth, potty training, activities and medicine
• Complete breastfeeding timer with tracking for both sides
• Sleep summaries and history, plus average sleep totals
• Track multiple children with individual profiles
• Reminders when it’s time for medication, feedings, and more
• Sync with multiple caregivers across different devices

PLUS MEMBERSHIP

• All free features, and:
• SweetSpot®:  Predicts the ideal time for sleep (2+ months)
• Schedule Creator: Plan age-appropriate sleep schedules
• Insights: Data-driven tips and miniplans for sleep, feedings, and milestones (0-17 months)
• Enhanced Reports: Discover your child’s trends
• AI Logging: Track your child’s day through text, voice message, or photo

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIP

• Everything in Plus, and:
• Berry: 24/7 guidance with our expert-vetted AI chat
• Custom Sleep Plans: expert-designed plans built for your child, with weekly progress check-ins and ongoing support as they grow 

GENTLE, EVIDENCE-BASED APPROACH

Our sleep guidance never requires "crying it out." Instead, we blend trusted sleep science with gentle, family-centered solutions that respect your parenting style. Every recommendation is made for your family's needs and comfort level.

PERSONALIZED PARENTING SUPPORT

• Expert newborn tracker tools and analytics
• Get custom sleep schedules based on your baby's age and patterns
• Science-backed guidance for common sleep challenges
• Navigate sleep regressions with confidence
• Receive timely recommendations as your baby grows
• Help your newborn develop healthy sleep habits from day one

AWARD-WINNING RESULTS

The Huckleberry baby tracker app ranked #1 in the iOS medical category globally. Today, we help families across 179 countries achieve better sleep. Up to 93% of families using our baby sleep tracking report improved sleep patterns.

Whether you're navigating newborn sleep, infant solids or toddler milestones, Huckleberry provides the tools and guidance your family needs to flourish.

With the AHA eBook Reader you can read all your American Heart Association (AHA) eBooks online, offline or anytime on your mobile device.

You can log into this eBook reader using the same account information as your AHA account.

How to add AHA eBooks to your AHA eBook Reader
1. Open your AHA eBook Reader.
2. Authorize your eBook Reader using your account information from the AHA eBooks website.
3. Your Bookshelf will show all your purchased books.
4. Click on the title you want to download to your eBook Reader. Your download will start automatically.
5. After download is complete, click on that title to read your eBook on your mobile device.

With your AHA eBook Reader, you can 
- Search in titles
- Sort by category
- Add bookmarks
- Change the font size
- Jump within the text between chapters
- Jump within text to figures, tables, references.
- Preview other AHA eBooks

The American Heart Association is the nation’s oldest, largest voluntary organization devoted to fighting cardiovascular diseases and stroke.
